meanings: (말·힘·무기 등으로) fight, do battle (with), (말다툼하다) argue, quarrel, (전쟁을 하다) be at a war (with)

meanings.meaning: yield the sovereignty without a struggle

vlive.korean: 오렌지주스를 어떻게 부으면서 싸우지? How do you pour orange juice and fight? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST REN] 안뇽🦋
vlive.english: How do you pour orange juice and fight?

vlive.korean: 싸우지 마 싸우지 마! - 왜? Don't fight, don't fight! - Why? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [Stray Kids(스트레이 키즈) : SKZ-TALKER(슼즈토커)] Ep.21
대부분 싸우지 않나? Don't you usually fight? 듣기 View video BTOB : 토근길2
맨날... - 싸우지 마! Everyday. - Don't fight! 듣기 View video WINNER : 강승윤 생일 브이라이브 🎉YOONSBIRTHDAY🙏🏼❤️

vlive.english: Hey. - Don't fight. - During the show!

examples.korean: It’s best to let her go her own way if you don’t want a fight. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 싸우지 않으려면 그녀가 자기 하고 싶은 대로 하게 놔두는 게 최선이야. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’s best to let her go her own way if you don’t want a fight. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They gave up without a fight. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 싸우지 않고 포기했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They gave up without a fight. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She will not give up her children without a struggle. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 싸우지도 않고 아이들을 포기하지는 않을 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She will not give up her children without a struggle. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The best victory is when the opponent surrenders of its own accord before there are any actual hostilities...It is best to win without fighting. (Sun-tzu) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 싸우지 않고 적이 스스로 항복하는 것이 최고의 승리이다... 싸우지 않고 이기는 것이 최선이다. (손자, 성공명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: The best victory is when the opponent surrenders of its own accord before there are any actual hostilities...It is best to win without fighting. (Sun-tzu) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Challenges are gifts that force us to search for a new center of gravity. Don't fight them. Just find a different way to stand. (Oprah Winfrey) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 도전은 우리로 하여금 새로운 무게 중심을 찾게 하는 선물입니다. 맞서 싸우지 마세요. 그저 중심을 잡을 수 있는 다른 방법을 찾아 보세요. (오프라 윈프리, 도전명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Challenges are gifts that force us to search for a new center of gravity. Don't fight them. Just find a different way to stand. (Oprah Winfrey) Add to Wordbook
